features.dll
Dream-State Kernel
Installs directly into your REM cycle. No hard drive required. No hard drive possible.
"Where does software live when the screen goes dark?"
PipelineOS™ Architecture
Every data stream flows through metaphorical copper piping. Throughput measured in gallons/thought.
"What carries everything and holds nothing?"
Anti-Porcelain Firewall
Military-grade protection against Big Porcelain surveillance. They're watching your bathroom. We're watching them.
"Who guards the guardian of the cistern?"
Feline Approval Protocol
All system changes require CFO authorization. Average approval time: 14 hours (nap-dependent).
"What decides everything by doing nothing?"
Lucid Admin Mode
Gain root access by achieving lucidity mid-dream. Success rate: 2.3%. Side effects: seeing plumbing diagrams everywhere.

faq.exe — FREQUENTLY ASKED RIDDLES
How do I install Ouroboros OS?
"What is installed was never not there. You do not download the river — you simply remember you were always swimming."

(In practical terms: fall asleep thinking about copper pipes. If you dream of a U-bend, the installation was successful.)
What are the system requirements?
"Can a fish describe water? Can a pipe describe what flows through it? You are the system. The requirements are you."

(Minimum: a functioning pineal gland, 6+ hours of sleep, no active Kohler products within 15 meters.)
Why is the cat your CFO?
"Who sleeps on money and yet owns nothing? Who approves by silence and denies by sitting? She was CFO before she knew. She was CFO before I knew."

(Princess Flufferbutt sat on the Articles of Incorporation in 2003. Arthur interpreted this as a binding vote. No one has challenged it.)
What is Big Porcelain?
"What gleams white and swallows secrets? What sits in every home yet nobody questions? The throne you sit upon is not your throne. It reports to them."

(A consortium of toilet manufacturers Arthur believes are embedding surveillance firmware in flush mechanisms. He has filed 23 FOIA requests. All denied.)
Can I get a refund?
"Can you un-dream a dream? Can you un-flush a flush? What is given in sleep cannot be returned in waking."

(No. All sales are final. Also, we're not entirely sure how you paid us.)

Ouroboros OS is not a real operating system, except in the ways that matter. Not endorsed by any plumbing board, technology company, or cat. Big Porcelain's legal team has asked us to clarify that they are "not a cabal." We note that's exactly what a cabal would say.
